commits.message: All seepage water sources produce one unit of water (one bowl) per hour.  Upgrading increases reservers, not rate.  The known time of the first refill step from empty now matches the expected time for subsequent refill steps (the first step no longer has a huge time advantage, meaning that a source can't be exploited by keeping it constantly on empty).  Fixes #79
First-step refill times for pond and wells now in line with new numbers (1, 3, and 7 epocs).
Various raw/cooked meats consistently containable.  Fixes jasonrohrer/OneLife#132

Improved a bunch of little rough edges in the tutorial.  The camera-freezing section is now much more clear and fool-proof.  There are multiple warnings about the last optional area NOT helping you to pass the tutorial (at least two recent Steam reviewers got stuck trying to forge an axe, thinking that was required).
